intro: Coelogyne turpis, commonly known as the Turps orchid, is a species of orchid native to Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its compact growth habit and produces clusters of fragrant, white to pale yellow flowers. The plant typically grows on trees or rocks, exhibiting an epiphytic lifestyle. Its leaves are dark green,革质 (leathery), and arranged in a fan shape. Coelogyne turpis is valued in horticulture for its ornamental flowers and relatively easy care requirements.
